item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: God declared war on the US and Israel, according to the new Hamas leader. According to Pat Robertson, though, God wants Bush to win in 2004. Is God trying to create a war?! When someone says that God told them something you agree with, that person is a spiritual leader. But if it's something you don't agree with, that person is a lunatic. Weird how that works. Kinda like everything: people only believe what they want to believe.
